short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expand your vocabulary with the word of the day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on the extension icon, and the Word of the Day will appear in a dropdown menu. Each day you will be given a new word that will help to grow your vocabulary.
